text:
Optional: use also Yeo atlas since it's also a functional atlas.

The goal is to have an example using several functional atlases. Using ABIDE or ADHD seems like a good idea to me.
title: Create an example using Power + NiftiSpheresMasker and Destrieux atlases.

text:
You have in mind a connectome example?

We might need to develop helper functions to get the center of ROIs from
a label img, to use more easily plot_connectome.
Will this something to do a 4D plotting example ? Since we plan to include alll atlases with Power atlas and Destrieux.
Forget about the comment. Destrieux isn't a 4D image. Mistaken.
I wish to work on this issue.How do I start?
@AlexandreAbraham is this issue related to this open PR #645 ?
AFAIK, Yes it is. But the PR #645 is using only Power atlas.
